The user moulds [[water]] into the shape of a dragon, which they then direct at a target. The water crashes upon the target, dealing significant physical damage. Ideally, users will use pre-existing bodies of water for this technique, but sufficiently skilled users can instead create the water themselves, spitting the dragon from their mouths. The more talented the user, the greater the amount of water that the dragon can be made from.<ref name="d1"/>

== Trivia ==
* When written as "水流", ''suiryū'' means "water current".
* During this technique's first appearance, it is performed with forty-four [[hand seals]], the most to ever be seen used for one jutsu. Far fewer hand seals are used during subsequent appearances.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 120, page 4</ref><ref>''Naruto'' chapter 577, page 4</ref><ref>''Naruto'' chapter 587, pages 10-11</ref>
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden the Movie]]'', when [[Shizuku]] was under the influence of [[Strengthening Prescription: Chakra Injection|medically altered chakra]], she was able to control the water dragon to seek out her targets from a great distance.
